history.text: I am looking at  information about the movie Bruce Almighty
Jim Carey is Bruce Nolan in the movie, so I bet it is funny!
The rating says rotten tomatoes 48% with a rating of 5.7 out of 10. Thats really surprising as most of Carreys movies are extremely funny.
Yes, I agree and The Critics response is He is hilarious in the slapstick scenes
Morgan Freeman stars in it as well.
Not to mention Jennifer Aniston
Oh yeah Jennifer Aniston is always good in anything she stars in.
Agreed, and Morgan Freeman is a favorite of mine
Imagine getting to be God. Aint that a riot. I have never saw a bad Morgan Freeman movie
I know Right? but I am not familiar with the director Tom Shadyac
The info we have is calling this one of Jims best movies wonder why it is rated so low. I have never heard of him til now.
I wonder if he directs all of Jim Carreys movies.
Could be? I see that Steve Carell is in the movie
His name doesnt ring a bell but Im sure I would recognize him if I saw him.
Are you speaking of steve carell? I think he played in the movie Evan Almighty
Im pretty sure..

This is our first movie information page. Im not sure how we are supposed  to proced. I know it said we to interact with each other 5 times at least. Yes Carrell doesnt he play in the tv show The Office.?
Yes that was a funny movie too.
I dont know either haha and yes you are correct
Im gonna try to look at the instruction for this hit . I will be back in a minute dont leave. Ok
I am reading about the key scenes
ok
so in the 1st scene he is liking 2 woman uh oh..bad news right ther and the 2nd scene is mentioning powers that cause crazy stuff and he starts hearing voices
You know I did not see those at first I did take time to read them now. The voices are prayers that people are praying to God. He doesnt want to deal with it so he says yes to all the prayers.
he then creates a email system to receive prayers and winds up answering yes to every prayer
Yes that is funny
welcome back btw
Thanks
Aw in scene 3 he prays for grace to find a man that makes her happy
I see how it works now it adds a little bit of info every few minutes . Yes that was a tear jerker part for me.
wow! then he is in the hospital? I wonder what happened
I dont know but it says he was revived
so a near death or dead then alive kinda thing?
Sounds like he learned a lesson about himself though be cause it says he changes his style of reporting and proposes to Grace  during his news report.
That is cool they reconciled and wound up getting married! I  agree he learned a valuable lesson
oops i mean engaged
It says that there is a homeless man at the end of the movie that Bruce ran into during various parts of the movie. I remember seeing the homeless guy at the end but not during the movie.
really? I never saw the movie, but after reading about it and chatting with you I will !
Hey I think we can finish now. It was really good discussing Bruce Almighty with you. Reallly you never saw it.???
Nope but I saw evan almighty :)
